alert.note: Alert for Iron; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iron and northeastern Price Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Turtle Flambeau Flowage, Mercer, Long Lake, Manitowish, and Fisher Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
